name: Reflections
overview: Reflections presents one or two players with a 12x12 grid, with contains between 10 and 39 mirrors. They are angled either from top-left to bottom-right or from top-right to bottom-left. The task is to identify and locate them accurately. This is done by firing a beam of light from one of the 24 edges, observing where it re-emerges from, and using this to build up an impression. The player must guess at a location (and direction) every three turns, but can guess at any time - an incorrect guess will cost points.
